loginDescription: Shyiramo amakuru yawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya ukurikije uruhare rwawe.
errorUnexpected: Habaye ikibazo kitari giteganijwe. Ongera ugerageze.
errorEmailInUse: Iyi email isanzwe ikoreshwa na yindi konti.
errorWeakPassword: Ijambobanga riroroshye cyane. Rigomba kuba rifite nibura inyuguti 6.
schoolRegistrationSuccessDesc: Ishuri '{{schoolName}}' na konti y'umuyobozi wayo byafunguwe. Ubu ushobora kwinjira.
registerSchoolPageDescription: Shyiraho amakuru y'ishuri ryawe kuri Report-Manager Lite maze ufungure na konti y'umuyobozi mukuru.
platformGoalEN: To provide a comprehensive, user-friendly, and multilingual platform for Rwandan schools (both general education and TVET) to efficiently manage student academic records, including marks, attendance, and behavior, ultimately simplifying the process of generating accurate and insightful report cards.
platformGoalFR: Fournir une plateforme complète, conviviale et multilingue pour les écoles rwandaises (enseignement général et EFTP) afin de gérer efficacement les dossiers académiques des élèves, y compris les notes, les présences et le comportement, simplifiant ainsi le processus de génération de bulletins de notes précis et perspicaces.
platformGoalRW: Gutanga urubuga rwuzuye, rworoshye gukoresha kandi rw'indimi nyinshi ku mashuri yo mu Rwanda (yaba ay'uburezi rusange na TVET) kugira ngo babe bashobora gucunga neza amakuru y'imyigire y'abanyeshuri, harimo amanota, kutitabira amasomo, n'imyitwarire, byoroshya uburyo bwo gukora raporo z'ukuri kandi zisobanutse.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Shyiramo kandi ubare amanota y'amagerageza n'ibizamini ku buryo bworoshye.
featureReportCardsDesc: Kora indangamanota zuzuye z'abanyeshuri mu buryo bwikora buri gihembwe.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Ohereza amakuru n'indangamanota ku babyeyi n'abarezi mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga.
featureAttendanceBehaviorDesc: Kurikirana ubwitabire bw'abanyeshuri n'amakuru ajyanye n'ikinyabupfura.
featureTeacherStudentReportsDesc: Bona raporo zirambuye z'umusaruro w'amashuri, amasomo, n'abanyeshuri ku giti cyabo.
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Ongeramo amafoto y'abanyeshuri kandi ucunge inyandiko z'ingenzi.
featureCommunicationDesc: Ahantu hamwe ho gutangira amatangazo n'itumanaho hagati y'abakozi.
feedbackPageDescription: Igitekerezo cyawe ni ingenzi! Dusangize ibyifuzo cyangwa ibibazo wahuye na byo.
feedbackSubmittedDesc: Urakoze ku gitekerezo cyawe! Turagushimiye umwanya wafashe.
feedbackSubmissionFailedDesc: Ntibishobokye ko igitekerezo cyawe cyoherezwa. Ongera ugerageze.
aiWelcomeMessage: Muraho! Ndi umufasha wawe w'ikoranabuhanga (AI) kuri Report-Manager Lite. Nkumuntu ufite uruhare rwa {{role}}, nshobora kugufasha mu mirimo nko gushaka amakuru y'umunyeshuri, kureba amanota, cyangwa gusobanura imikorere y'uru rubuga. Nagufasha iki none?
aiErrorMessage: Mbabarira, habaye ikibazo. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze mu kanya.
